text: Franco Benedetti (born 30 October 1932) is a retired Greco-Roman wrestler from Italy. He competed at the 1952 and 1960 Olympics and finished in 5th and 12th place, respectively. He won a bronze medal at the 1953 World Wrestling Championships. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1932 births Category:Olympic wrestlers of Italy Category:Wrestlers at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Italian male sport wrestlers Category:World Wrestling Championships medalists
title: Franco Benedetti
